Paragraph: 45 However , the PCE of the random terpolymers showed a the nonlinear compositional dependence from 2 to 6% in the order P3 ( 5.61% ) > P4 ( 5.26% ) > P2 ( 4.91% ) > P5 ( 3.02% ) > P6 ( 2.09% ) ; this was consistent with the observed trend of the J SC .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P3 |
| P4 |
| P2 |
| P5 |
| P6 |

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph. They are presented as they are in the original paragraph.

| --- |

| P4 |

The only entities in the paragraph are the names of the materials P3, P4, P2, P5, and P6. They are presented as they are in the original paragraph.
